import React from 'react' import Logo from '../../Logo/Logo.js' import NavigationItems from '../NavigationItems/NavigationItems.js' import classes from './SideDrawer.module.css' import Backdrop from '../../UI/Backdrop/Backdrop.js' const SideDrawer = (props) => { let attachedClass = [classes.SideDrawer, classes.Close] if (props.showDrawer) { attachedClass = [classes.SideDrawer, classes.Open] } return (
) } export default SideDrawer
